about_the_game:
Automated & Self Sustained - is a Coop top down extraction shooter where you and your friends play as drones fight alien monsters on abandoned planet. Craft weapons and wheels, combine your own machine of destruction and dive into hostile environment full of enemies.

Prosperous planet on edge of human empire is sending distress signal and your drone squad is tasked to investigate. But on your way command center stopped responding and now you are left for yourself.

Cooperative game for 1-4 players

Gather up with your friends or risk coming alone. Scrap, explore and fight against strange alien creatures. Work together or mess with your team, while trying to survive in different
facilities left by mankind.

Build your own drone

All drones are modular and you are not exception. Craft, find or steal from your friends different drone parts, from wheels and frames to missile launchers and flamethrowers. Attach them to yourself or your friends and bring destruction to pesky enemies.

Scrap, recycle, loot

Everything you need requires different metals. Take everything you can. There is no inventory, so grab furniture, machines, supplies and bring them to shredder to get valuable resources. Repair your ship, craft better parts, more powerful weapons and avoid ammunition shortages.

Only one live

You only have one try. Survive as long as you can and get to the truth behind human extinction. Explore vast planet full of different procedural generated location, remains of civilization. With random at hand be ready for anything. Keep your core safe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.5GHz, 2 cores, 4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650 or better with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 60 FPS on medium settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.40GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 60 FPS on high settings

short_description: Coop rogue-like extraction shooter about self-sustained modular drones on sphere shaped alien-full planet. In this game you will maintain workability of mothership and drones by recycling anything that is not attached to floor.
